特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Focus on academic standards of research. Students will work mostly individually and in pairs. Students will be expected to complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class.

For students who have permission to take this course online, the online course will be held in the following formats:
- simultaneous two-way online broadcast of face-to-face classes
- (if necessary) on-demand broadcast of data recorded from face-to-face classes

第3回: Week 3: Research project: data collection and analysis
第4回: Week 4: Research project: data analysis and drawing conclusions
第7回: Week 7: Research paper: feedback and editing
第8回: Week 8: Research paper: finalizing the paper draft
トピック.授業外学習2: This is a writing and research intensive class, so students can expect at least 3 hours of homework a week.

評価.教科書Required texts0: No textbook. Materials will be prepared by the instructor.
